definitions.definition: A lustrous, white, metallic element, atomic number 47, atomic weight 107.87, symbol Ag.
(collectively) Coins made from silver or any similar white metal.
(collectively) Cutlery and other eating utensils, whether silver or made from some other white metal.
(collectively) Any items made from silver or any other white metal.
Anything resembling silver; something shiny and white.
To cover with silver, or with a silvery metal.
definitions.example: to silver a pin;  to silver a glass mirror plate with an amalgam of tin and mercury

definitions.definition: To polish like silver; to impart a brightness to, like that of silver.
To make hoary, or white, like silver.
Having a color like silver: a shiny gray.
Denoting the twenty-fifth anniversary, especially of a wedding.
(of commercial services) Premium, but inferior to gold.
Having the clear, musical tone of silver; soft and clear in sound.
